import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table'; function PostUser() { const postObj={ userId:"", title:"", body } const [data,setData]=useState(postObj) const handleChange=(event)=>{ setData({...data,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } const [display,setDisplay]=useState() const handleClick=()=>{ axios.post("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts",data) .then(response=>response.data) .then(res=>{ console.log(res) setDisplay(res) }) } return ( <>
Body
{ display ? (
userId Title Body
{display.userId} {display.title} {display.body}
) : "" } ) } export default PostUser
